items.name: Kumerica
items.description: Kumerica is a mordern city with rich traditional history. Kumericans are social and outgoing

items.name: Tamale
items.description: Tamale is the capital of the Northen region of Ghana. A traditional city taht can boast of many tourist places and national parks
